mapper.select: SELECT BNO, B_TNO, B_TYPE, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_HIDDEN, b.MNO, M.NICNAME, B.CREATE_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.STATUS, NMNO, CANO, CNO, B_LEVEL, TARGET_BNO, IS_OPEN, NEED_POINT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE TARGET_BNO = B.BNO) AS COMMENTS FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.MNO = M.MNO) WHERE NMNO = #{nmno} AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND (B_TYPE = 200 OR B_TYPE = 100) ORDER BY BNO DESC

SELECT BNO, B_TNO, B_TYPE, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_HIDDEN, b.MNO, M.NICNAME, B.CREATE_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.STATUS, NMNO, CANO, CNO, B_LEVEL, TARGET_BNO, IS_OPEN, NEED_POINT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.MNO = M.MNO) WHERE NMNO = #{nmno} AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND (B_TYPE = 101 OR B_TYPE = 201)

SELECT BNO, B_TNO, B_TYPE, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_HIDDEN, b.MNO, M.NICNAME, TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATE_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.STATUS, NMNO, CANO, CNO, B_LEVEL, TARGET_BNO, IS_OPEN, NEED_POINT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.MNO = M.MNO) WHERE BNO = #{bno}
